verses.name: Numbers 27:20
verses.text: And thou shalt put some of thine honour upon him, that all the congregation of the children of Israel may be obedient.

verses.name: Numbers 27:21
verses.text: And he shall stand before Eleazar the priest, who shall ask counsel for him after the judgment of Urim before the Lord: at his word shall they go out, and at his word they shall come in, both he, and all the children of Israel with him, even all the congregation.

verses.name: Numbers 27:22
verses.text: And Moses did as the Lord commanded him: and he took Joshua, and set him before Eleazar the priest, and before all the congregation:
